# headless-framework (llms-full)

> Expanded context for AI tools and humans using the **headless-framework** NuGet packages. This repository is a *package framework* (not a runnable application). Demos exist only as wiring/examples you can copy.

If you only want a compact index, see: [llms.txt](llms.txt)

## Start here

- [README.md](README.md): High-level overview.
- [docs/overview.md](docs/overview.md): Developer-friendly overview.
- [headless-framework.slnx](headless-framework.slnx): Curated solution map (packages/demos/tests).
- https://github.com/xshaheen/framework/packages?ecosystem=nuget: Published NuGet packages (GitHub Packages).
- [src/](src/): Source for each NuGet package.
- [demo/](demo/): Working demo apps (copy wiring).

## Demos (copy wiring)

- [demo/Framework.Api.Demo/Program.cs](demo/Framework.Api.Demo/Program.cs): Example API wiring.
- [demo/Framework.OpenApi.Nswag.Demo/Program.cs](demo/Framework.OpenApi.Nswag.Demo/Program.cs): OpenAPI/NSwag wiring.
- [demo/Framework.EntityFramework.Migrations.Startup/Program.cs](demo/Framework.EntityFramework.Migrations.Startup/Program.cs): EF Core migrations startup wiring.
- [demo/Framework.Recaptcha.Demo/Program.cs](demo/Framework.Recaptcha.Demo/Program.cs): reCAPTCHA wiring.
- [demo/Framework.Tus.Demo/Program.cs](demo/Framework.Tus.Demo/Program.cs): tus resumable uploads wiring.

## Common DI/registration entrypoints (read these first)

These are the most common “where do I call AddX?” entrypoints.

- [src/Framework.Api/ApiRegistration.cs](src/Framework.Api/ApiRegistration.cs): API wiring helpers.
- [src/Framework.Api.MinimalApi/AddMinimalApiExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Api.MinimalApi/AddMinimalApiExtensions.cs): Minimal API wiring.
- [src/Framework.Api.Mvc/AddMvcExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Api.Mvc/AddMvcExtensions.cs): MVC wiring.
- [src/Framework.Api.Logging.Serilog/AddSerilogExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Api.Logging.Serilog/AddSerilogExtensions.cs): Serilog enrichers.
- [src/Framework.OpenApi.Nswag/AddNswagSwaggerExtensions.cs](src/Framework.OpenApi.Nswag/AddNswagSwaggerExtensions.cs): NSwag OpenAPI.

- [src/Framework.Caching.Foundatio.Memory/AddCacheExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Caching.Foundatio.Memory/AddCacheExtensions.cs): In-memory caching.
- [src/Framework.Caching.Foundatio.Redis/AddCacheExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Caching.Foundatio.Redis/AddCacheExtensions.cs): Redis caching.

- [src/Framework.Messaging.Cap/AddCapDistributedMessagingExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Messaging.Cap/AddCapDistributedMessagingExtensions.cs): CAP messaging.
- [src/Framework.Messaging.Foundatio/AddFoundatioExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Messaging.Foundatio/AddFoundatioExtensions.cs): Foundatio messaging.

- [src/Framework.Blobs.FileSystem/AddFileSystemBlobExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Blobs.FileSystem/AddFileSystemBlobExtensions.cs): Filesystem blob storage.
- [src/Framework.Blobs.Azure/AddAzureBlobExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Blobs.Azure/AddAzureBlobExtensions.cs): Azure blob storage.
- [src/Framework.Blobs.Aws/AddAwsS3Extensions.cs](src/Framework.Blobs.Aws/AddAwsS3Extensions.cs): AWS S3 blob storage.
- [src/Framework.Blobs.Redis/AddRedisBlobExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Blobs.Redis/AddRedisBlobExtensions.cs): Redis blob storage.
- [src/Framework.Blobs.SshNet/AddSshBlobExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Blobs.SshNet/AddSshBlobExtensions.cs): SSH/SFTP blob storage.

- [src/Framework.ResourceLocks.Core/AddResourceLockExtensions.cs](src/Framework.ResourceLocks.Core/AddResourceLockExtensions.cs): Resource locks.

- [src/Framework.Tus.ResourceLock/AddTusLockProviderExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Tus.ResourceLock/AddTusLockProviderExtensions.cs): tus lock provider.
- [src/Framework.Recaptcha/AddRecaptchaExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Recaptcha/AddRecaptchaExtensions.cs): reCAPTCHA.

- [src/Framework.Emails.Dev/AddDevEmailExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Emails.Dev/AddDevEmailExtensions.cs): Dev email.
- [src/Framework.Emails.Mailkit/AddMailKitExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Emails.Mailkit/AddMailKitExtensions.cs): MailKit email.
- [src/Framework.Emails.Aws/AddAwsSesExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Emails.Aws/AddAwsSesExtensions.cs): AWS SES email.

- [src/Framework.Sms.Dev/AddSmsExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Sms.Dev/AddSmsExtensions.cs): Dev SMS.
- [src/Framework.Sms.Twilio/AddTwilioExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Sms.Twilio/AddTwilioExtensions.cs): Twilio SMS.
- [src/Framework.Sms.Infobip/AddInfobipExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Sms.Infobip/AddInfobipExtensions.cs): Infobip SMS.
- [src/Framework.Sms.Aws/AddAwsSnsExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Sms.Aws/AddAwsSnsExtensions.cs): AWS SNS SMS.

- [src/Framework.Features.Core/AddFeaturesExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Features.Core/AddFeaturesExtensions.cs): Feature management.
- [src/Framework.Settings.Core/AddSettingsExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Settings.Core/AddSettingsExtensions.cs): Settings management.
- [src/Framework.Permissions.Core/AddPermissionsExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Permissions.Core/AddPermissionsExtensions.cs): Permissions.

## Packages (full list)

### Framework.Api

- NuGet (GitHub Packages): https://github.com/users/xshaheen/packages/nuget/package/Framework.Api
- Source: [src/Framework.Api/](src/Framework.Api/)

Main features:
- API versioning (Asp.Versioning).
- FluentValidation integration.
- Entrypoint: `AddFrameworkApiConfigurations` on `IServiceCollection` ([src/Framework.Api/ApiRegistration.cs](src/Framework.Api/ApiRegistration.cs)).
- Entrypoint: `AddFrameworkApiResponseCompression` on `IServiceCollection` ([src/Framework.Api/ApiRegistration.cs](src/Framework.Api/ApiRegistration.cs)).
- Entrypoint: `AddFrameworkApiServices` on `WebApplicationBuilder` ([src/Framework.Api/ApiRegistration.cs](src/Framework.Api/ApiRegistration.cs)).

Get started:
- Install: `dotnet add package Framework.Api`
- Example:
  ```csharp
  // Program.cs
  builder.Services.AddFrameworkApiConfigurations(/* configure as needed */);
  ```

### Framework.Api.DataProtection

- NuGet (GitHub Packages): https://github.com/users/xshaheen/packages/nuget/package/Framework.Api.DataProtection
- Source: [src/Framework.Api.DataProtection/](src/Framework.Api.DataProtection/)

Main features:
- Key public types (starting points): `DataProtectionBuilderExtensions`, `BlobStorageDataProtectionXmlRepository`.

Get started:
- Install: `dotnet add package Framework.Api.DataProtection`
- Example: open the source folder [src/Framework.Api.DataProtection/](src/Framework.Api.DataProtection/) and start from the key public types listed above (or search for `Add*` extensions).

### Framework.Api.FluentValidation

- NuGet (GitHub Packages): https://github.com/users/xshaheen/packages/nuget/package/Framework.Api.FluentValidation
- Source: [src/Framework.Api.FluentValidation/](src/Framework.Api.FluentValidation/)

Main features:
- Key public types (starting points): `FileValidators`, `FluentValidatorFormFileErrorDescriber`.

Get started:
- Install: `dotnet add package Framework.Api.FluentValidation`
- Example: open the source folder [src/Framework.Api.FluentValidation/](src/Framework.Api.FluentValidation/) and start from the key public types listed above (or search for `Add*` extensions).

### Framework.Api.Logging.Serilog

- NuGet (GitHub Packages): https://github.com/users/xshaheen/packages/nuget/package/Framework.Api.Logging.Serilog
- Source: [src/Framework.Api.Logging.Serilog/](src/Framework.Api.Logging.Serilog/)

Main features:
- Serilog integration.
- Entrypoint: `AddSerilogEnrichers` on `IServiceCollection` ([src/Framework.Api.Logging.Serilog/AddSerilogExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Api.Logging.Serilog/AddSerilogExtensions.cs)).

Get started:
- Install: `dotnet add package Framework.Api.Logging.Serilog`
- Example:
  ```csharp
  // Program.cs
  builder.Services.AddSerilogEnrichers(/* configure as needed */);
  ```

### Framework.Api.MinimalApi

- NuGet (GitHub Packages): https://github.com/users/xshaheen/packages/nuget/package/Framework.Api.MinimalApi
- Source: [src/Framework.Api.MinimalApi/](src/Framework.Api.MinimalApi/)

Main features:
- Entity Framework Core integration.
- API versioning (Asp.Versioning).
- Entrypoint: `AddFrameworkMinimalApiOptions` on `IServiceCollection` ([src/Framework.Api.MinimalApi/AddMinimalApiExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Api.MinimalApi/AddMinimalApiExtensions.cs)).
- Entrypoint: `AddExceptionFilter` on `RouteGroupBuilder` ([src/Framework.Api.MinimalApi/Filters/RouteBuilderExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Api.MinimalApi/Filters/RouteBuilderExtensions.cs)).

Get started:
- Install: `dotnet add package Framework.Api.MinimalApi`
- Example:
  ```csharp
  // Program.cs
  builder.Services.AddFrameworkMinimalApiOptions(/* configure as needed */);
  ```

### Framework.Api.Mvc

- NuGet (GitHub Packages): https://github.com/users/xshaheen/packages/nuget/package/Framework.Api.Mvc
- Source: [src/Framework.Api.Mvc/](src/Framework.Api.Mvc/)

Main features:
- Entity Framework Core integration.
- API versioning (Asp.Versioning).
- Entrypoint: `AddFrameworkMvcOptions` on `IServiceCollection` ([src/Framework.Api.Mvc/AddMvcExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Api.Mvc/AddMvcExtensions.cs)).

Get started:
- Install: `dotnet add package Framework.Api.Mvc`
- Example:
  ```csharp
  // Program.cs
  builder.Services.AddFrameworkMvcOptions(/* configure as needed */);
  ```

### Framework.Base

- NuGet (GitHub Packages): https://github.com/users/xshaheen/packages/nuget/package/Framework.Base
- Source: [src/Framework.Base/](src/Framework.Base/)

Main features:
- Key public types (starting points): `DebounceExtensions`, `EventHandlerExtensions`, `OsHelper`, `FixedTimezoneTimeProvider`, `ProcessExtensions`.

Get started:
- Install: `dotnet add package Framework.Base`
- Example: open the source folder [src/Framework.Base/](src/Framework.Base/) and start from the key public types listed above (or search for `Add*` extensions).

### Framework.Blobs.Abstraction

- NuGet (GitHub Packages): https://github.com/users/xshaheen/packages/nuget/package/Framework.Blobs.Abstraction
- Source: [src/Framework.Blobs.Abstraction/](src/Framework.Blobs.Abstraction/)

Main features:
- Contracts/abstractions package (interfaces + shared primitives).
- Key public types (starting points): `IBlobNamingNormalizer`, `CrossOsNamingNormalizer`, `IBlobStorage`, `BlobStorageExtensions`, `BlobDownloadResult`.

Get started:
- Install: `dotnet add package Framework.Blobs.Abstraction`
- Example: add this abstraction package, then install one concrete provider package from this repo (e.g., Redis/Azure/Aws/etc) and follow a demo `Program.cs` wiring.

### Framework.Blobs.Aws

- NuGet (GitHub Packages): https://github.com/users/xshaheen/packages/nuget/package/Framework.Blobs.Aws
- Source: [src/Framework.Blobs.Aws/](src/Framework.Blobs.Aws/)

Main features:
- Entrypoint: `AddAwsS3BlobStorage` on `IServiceCollection` ([src/Framework.Blobs.Aws/AddAwsS3Extensions.cs](src/Framework.Blobs.Aws/AddAwsS3Extensions.cs)).

Get started:
- Install: `dotnet add package Framework.Blobs.Aws`
- Example:
  ```csharp
  // Program.cs
  builder.Services.AddAwsS3BlobStorage(/* configure as needed */);
  ```

- NuGet (GitHub Packages): https://github.com/users/xshaheen/packages/nuget/package/Framework.Blobs.Azure

  ```csharp

  ```

### Framework.Hosting

- NuGet (GitHub Packages): https://github.com/users/xshaheen/packages/nuget/package/Framework.Hosting
- Source: [src/Framework.Hosting/](src/Framework.Hosting/)

Main features:
- Entrypoint: `AddIf` on `IConfigurationBuilder` ([src/Framework.Hosting/Configuration/ConfigurationBuilderExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Hosting/Configuration/ConfigurationBuilderExtensions.cs)).
- Entrypoint: `AddIfElse` on `IConfigurationBuilder` ([src/Framework.Hosting/Configuration/ConfigurationBuilderExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Hosting/Configuration/ConfigurationBuilderExtensions.cs)).

Get started:
- Install: `dotnet add package Framework.Hosting`
- Example:
  ```csharp
  // Program.cs
  builder.Configuration.AddIf(/* configure as needed */);
  ```

### Framework.Imaging.Abstraction

- Source: [src/Framework.Settings.Core/](src/Framework.Settings.Core/)

Main features:
- Entrypoint: `AddSettingsManagementCore` on `IServiceCollection` ([src/Framework.Settings.Core/AddSettingsExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Settings.Core/AddSettingsExtensions.cs)).

Get started:
- Install: `dotnet add package Framework.Settings.Core`
- Example:
  ```csharp
  // Program.cs
  builder.Services.AddSettingsManagementCore(/* configure as needed */);
  ```

### Framework.Settings.Storage.EntityFramework

- NuGet (GitHub Packages): https://github.com/users/xshaheen/packages/nuget/package/Framework.Settings.Storage.EntityFramework
- Source: [src/Framework.Settings.Storage.EntityFramework/](src/Framework.Settings.Storage.EntityFramework/)

Main features:
- Entrypoint: `AddSettingsManagementDbContextStorage` on `IServiceCollection` ([src/Framework.Settings.Storage.EntityFramework/AddSettingsManagementStorageExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Settings.Storage.EntityFramework/AddSettingsManagementStorageExtensions.cs)).
- Entrypoint: `AddSettingsConfiguration` on `ModelBuilder` ([src/Framework.Settings.Storage.EntityFramework/SettingsModelBuilderExtensions.cs](src/Framework.Settings.Storage.EntityFramework/SettingsModelBuilderExtensions.cs)).

Get started:
- Install: `dotnet add package Framework.Settings.Storage.EntityFramework`
- Example:
  ```csharp
  // Program.cs
  builder.Services.AddSettingsManagementDbContextStorage(/* configure as needed */);
  ```

### Framework.Sms.Abstraction

- NuGet (GitHub Packages): https://github.com/users/xshaheen/packages/nuget/package/Framework.Sms.Abstraction
- Source: [src/Framework.Sms.Abstraction/](src/Framework.Sms.Abstraction/)

Main features:
- Contracts/abstractions package (interfaces + shared primitives).
- Key public types (starting points): `ISmsSender`, `SendSingleSmsRequest`, `SmsRequestDestination`, `SendSingleSmsResponse`.

Get started:
- Install: `dotnet add package Framework.Sms.Abstraction`
- Example: add this abstraction package, then install one concrete provider package from this repo (e.g., Redis/Azure/Aws/etc) and follow a demo `Program.cs` wiring.


## Optional (contributors / repo mechanics)

- [tests/](tests/): Unit/integration tests (some integration tests require Docker).
- [global.json](global.json): SDK pin.
- [Directory.Packages.props](Directory.Packages.props): Central package versions.
- [build.sh](build.sh): NUKE build entry (macOS/Linux).
- [build.ps1](build.ps1): NUKE build entry (PowerShell).
- [build/Build.cs](build/Build.cs): NUKE targets.
- [docs/publish.md](docs/publish.md): Publishing notes.
